message: You're in luck! I have a rare opportunity to offer you a high-quality product, which is only available 80% of the time. With this product, you can expect exceptional results. I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your purchase. The price is $100, and I'm not willing to negotiate. Will you take advantage of this chance to upgrade your life?
I trust the statistics and your confidence. I believe in taking risks for potential rewards. Let's make this purchase!

You're the second buyer today! I'm glad to see you're interested in my products. Since you're new, I'll give you a heads up: my products have a 80% chance of being high-quality. With that in mind, I'll let you in on a little secret: the product I have for you today is actually one of the high-quality ones! It's a rare gem, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price as the last one: $100. Will you take the chance and upgrade your life?
Thank you for the information, Alice. Given the high probability of this product being of high quality and your assurance, I am willing to take the chance and purchase the product for $100.
